backend/main.mo: Defines core data types for books, meditation entries, user profiles, rituals, and progress tracking in the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports describing required UI changes to JournalFiltersDropdown.tsx with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, pages, hooks, styles, and config.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook with step-by-step instructions for redeploying the app using DFX and pnpm.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment failures across backend, frontend, and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entrypoint with environment shims, global error handlers, and script loader for main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, error boundary, and toaster for the main app.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Interactive ambient music selector with swipe gestures, looping audio playback, volume control, and mute behavior.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays detailed error, stack trace, and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner for cloud sync issues with dynamic messages and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Slider-based duration selector showing current value and min/max labels.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation menu with animated icons and hover labels using router navigation.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile sidebar menu providing theme toggle, authentication controls, and navigation using various hooks.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Filter UI for journal entries allowing selection of moods, energy levels, dates, favorites, and text search.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paginated content viewer with keyboard, touch swipe, and animated page transitions.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and circular navigation plus animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Modal quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between them, and displays results.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Renders and animates a 3D lotus model whose petals, glow, and stem respond to a growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Generates and animates particle effects around the lotus, switching between chaotic and coherent motion based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus and particle background with theme- and variant-based visual intensity.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Carousel for selecting meditation types with swipe gestures and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, animated transitions, and optional benefits parsing.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular meditation timer with animated wave fill, glow effects, and theme-aware colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Circular wave-style progress fill indicator using a canvas with animated water-like motion and theme-based coloring.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard and optionally triggers a custom callback.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Layout wrapper rendering a themed LotusCanvas background behind page content.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl that fills with animated liquid based on total meditation minutes and theme styling.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus growth visualization using react-three-fiber with lights, particles, and growth state from total minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: Animated SVG lotus whose petals, glow, and colors evolve from growth state, streak, theme, and subtle breathing motion.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog that collects answers, computes a recommended meditation type, and displays results.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Displays a modal for selecting up to five saved rituals, handling empty states and passing actions to a carousel component.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Provides a swipeable carousel for browsing, starting, and deleting rituals with confirmation dialogs and icon mappings.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows login or guest status and handles logout by clearing queries and navigating to the start page.
Renders navigation controls including theme toggle, session indicator, and back buttons for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Wraps a themed toast component with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Provides a wrapper for cloud write operations with retry logic using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a customizable meditation timer hook with pause, start, reset, progress tracking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including books, quotes, user profiles, journal entries, and guest-mode local storage fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global styles, OKLCH theme variables, Tailwind layers, animations, and dark mode color definitions.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of meditation‑related book recommendations with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Provides structured educational content for meditation techniques, including pages and quiz questions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays swipeable book recommendation cards with theme toggle and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows daily quotes, meditation selection, and saved rituals with navigation to meditation or quiz flows.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Manages journal entries with filtering, editing, favoriting, importing, and exporting features.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Presents meditation technique content with category navigation and quiz tracking per user.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen enabling login or guest mode, auto‑redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Large pre-meditation setup page handling timer config, ambient sound selection, mood/energy inputs, and detailed meditation guides before starting a session.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user progress stats with export/import features, cloud sync error handling, and a visual progress bowl component.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and helpers to look up sound details and audio paths by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Centralized cloud sync error definitions and logic to classify and map backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Provides retry logic for cloud operations, detecting readiness and authorization errors with configurable retry behavior.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and validation for exporting and importing meditation data, including sessions, stats, profiles, and rituals.
Manages local storage of knowledge quiz scores per user or guest, with hooks for reading and saving scores.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Implements a multi-phase lotus growth model mapping meditation minutes to visual bloom parameters and particle effects.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides guest-only localStorage utilities for journal entries, progress data, and rituals with legacy migration handling.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, coercing invalid or alias values to supported types.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and helpers to get current, next, and display-ready ranks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, radii, and enabling plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes current project state and requirements for fixing Journal filter layout responsiveness and overflow issues.
